mapper.select: select t.companyid "companyid", t.companyname "companyname" from l_company t where 1=1
select t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.graindepotname "graindepotname" from l_graindepot t where 1=1 and t.companyid=#{companyid}
select t.grainid "grainid", t.graincateid "graincateid", t.grainname "grainname", t.grainkind "grainkind", t.gbgraincode "gbgraincode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grain t where 1=1
select t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.grainattrcode "grainattrcode", t.grainattrname "grainattrname", t.gbgrainattrcode "gbgrainattrcode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grainattr t where 1=1
SELECT contTypeID "contTypeID", contTypeName "contTypeName", buySellFlag "buySellFlag" FROM l_contracttype where 1=1 and buySellFlag=#{buySellFlag}
SELECT goodstypeid "goodstypeid", goodstypename "goodstypename" FROM c_goodstype where 1=1 and graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
